responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "E16145E74AAD92E4310CF48380BEB011", "If you\'re in that much of a hurry, you might be able to creep down that tributary if you\'re very quiet. I think that could get you past all but the most wary of those Ramkin marauders. Let me tell you though, those Ramkin don\'t seem to be letting up, and if we don\'t stand against them, I don\'t have any faith that they won\'t make the portal soon enough. We\'re in this together, all for one. Can I count on you? ")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_MalaeKelori_7_Response
